summary: Adds a basement to the player home in Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod, so it may not be perfect, I do plan to update it and add more things.

This adds a trapdoor in the storage room of Proudspire Manor which will take you to the Proudspire Manor Basement, upon entry you will find a wardrobe - open it and the rest is self explanatory.

REQUIREMENTS:
This mod will be pointless unless you have the player home in Solitude - Proudspire Manor

INSTALL:Â 
Super duper easy, just drag the .esp file into your skyrim data folder and boot up the game :)

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated!
author: Maxranviir
